channel.title: BOF on Welcome to my site
channel.description: Recent content in BOF on Welcome to my site

item.title: Stable or turbulent organizational reform histories in the public sector: causes and effects? (2015-2019)
item.description: This PhD project is supervised by me and prof. dr. Koen Verhoest. It is funded by the University of Antwerp and executed by Bjorn Kleizen. Bjorn studies through quantitative and qualitative research the impact of reforms on the organizational climate in public sector organizations.
